blogPost.excerpt: Draw something and create a NFT in just a few seconds, it will eternize your art on Blockchain. Nifty Ink works on xDAI chain, you can mint a NFT just for a few fraction of a cent, so you need to have at least a few cents on xDAI token.
blogPost.body: Draw something and create a NFT in just a few seconds, it will eternize your art on Blockchain. Nifty Ink works on xDAI chain, you can mint a NFT just for a few fraction of a cent, so you need to have at least a few cents on xDAI token.
blogPost.title: Nifty Ink - Draw something and make it a NFT for less than 1 cent
blogPost.author: makio

localize.description: 在几秒钟内画出一些东西，并创建一个NFT，它将使你的艺术在区块链上永恒化。Nifty Ink在xDAI链上工作，你只需要花几分钱就可以铸造一个NFT，所以你需要至少有几分钱的xDAI代币。
localize.tagline: 画一些东西，然后把它做成NFT，价格不到1分钱。

localize.description: 在幾秒鐘內畫出一些東西，並創建一個NFT，它將使你的藝術在區塊鏈上永恆化。Nifty Ink在xDAI鏈上工作，你只需要花幾分錢就可以鑄造一個NFT，所以你需要至少有幾分錢的xDAI代幣。
localize.tagline: 畫一些東西，然後把它做成NFT，價格不到1分錢。

previous.excerpt: Welcome to brand new Sticker cards. Sticker Cards 2.0 has been rewritten from the ground up using new technologies and powerful frameworks and it’s something that you’ve never seen before.
previous.title: Sticker Cards 2.0 - Make gorgeous content cards from tweets and notes

localize.description: 欢迎来到全新的贴纸卡。Sticker Cards 2.0已经从头开始使用新的技术和强大的框架重新编写，这是你从未见过的。
localize.tagline: 从微博和笔记中制作华丽的内容卡片。

localize.description: 歡迎來到全新的貼紙卡。Sticker Cards 2.0已經從頭開始使用新的技術和強大的框架重新編寫，這是你從未見過的。
localize.tagline: 從微博和筆記中製作華麗的內容卡片。
